description: Network connectivity not available - device offline or no network access. Connectivity state issue.
commonCauses: WiFi and mobile data both off
No signal or out of range
prevention: Always check connectivity before network calls
examples: val cm = getSystemService(ConnectivityManager::class.java); val network = cm.activeNetwork; val capabilities = cm.getNetworkCapabilities(network); val hasInternet = capabilities?.hasCapability(NET_CAPABILITY_INTERNET) == true
cm.registerDefaultNetworkCallback(object : NetworkCallback() { override fun onAvailable(network: Network) { onConnected() }; override fun onLost(network: Network) { onDisconnected() } })
if (!isNetworkAvailable()) { showOfflineMode(); useC achedData() } else { makeNetworkRequest() }
// WorkManager queues work until connected: val constraints = Constraints.Builder().setRequiredNetworkType(CONNECTED).build()
